job_title: Software Developer - Oracle Forms, Reports, and APEX
job_purpose: Join the in-house IT team to support and enhance custom-built applications crucial to day-to-day operations, focusing on Oracle Forms, Reports, and APEX.
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Support and maintain existing Oracle Forms & Reports-based applications
Assist with new development using Oracle APEX for business-critical systems
Collaborate with Business Analysts and Developers throughout the software development lifecycle
Develop and maintain technical documentation for existing and new solutions
Support integrations between on-premise and cloud-based applications
Ensure smooth operation of key systems during a technology transition
required_qualifications: Proven experience with Oracle Forms & Reports
Strong understanding of enterprise application support
Ability to contribute to a custom-built software stack
Degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, or related field
Ability to work independently and within a team environment
company_details: Robert Half is a leading global specialized staffing firm that provides professional recruitment and consulting services. The company is committed to helping professionals find meaningful employment opportunities.
